verses.verse: שָׁפְטֵ֤נִי <S%H8199><s%> sha-fe-Te-ni Judge אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him me O God וְרִ֘יבָ֤ה <S%H7378><s%> ve-Ri-Vah and plead רִיבִ֗י <S%H7379><s%> ri-Vi, my cause מִגּ֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> mig-Goy nation לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not חָסִ֑יד <S%H2623><s%> cha-Sid; godly מֵ֤אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> Me-'ish- man מִרְמָ֖ה <S%H4820><s%> mir-Mah me from the deceitful וְעַוְלָ֣ה <S%H5766><s%> ve-'av-Lah and unjust תְפַלְּטֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6403><s%> te-fal-le-Te-ni. O deliver

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֤ה׀ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei For thou [art] the God מָֽעוּזִּי֮ <S%H4581><s%> ma-'uz-Zi of my strength לָמָ֪ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah why זְנַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי <S%H2186><s%> ze-Nach-Ta-ni why dost thou cast me off לָֽמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> lam-mah- Why קֹדֵ֥ר <S%H6937><s%> ko-Der I mourning אֶתְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'et-hal-Lech, ;why go בְּלַ֣חַץ <S%H3906><s%> be-La-chatz because of the oppression אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> o-Yev. of the enemy

שְׁלַח־ <S%H7971><s%> she-lach- O send out אוֹרְךָ֣ <S%H216><s%> 'or-Cha thy light וַ֭אֲמִתְּךָ <S%H571><s%> Va-'a-mit-te-cha and thy truth הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah them יַנְח֑וּנִי <S%H5148><s%> yan-Chu-ni; let them lead יְבִיא֥וּנִי <S%H935><s%> ye-vi-'U-ni me let them bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַֽר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- hill קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <S%H6944><s%> kod-she-cha me unto thy holy וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4908><s%> mish-ke-no-Tei-cha. and to thy tabernacles

וְאָב֤וֹאָה׀ <S%H935><s%> ve-'a-Vo-'ah Then will I go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מִזְבַּ֬ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach unto the altar אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֵל֮ <S%H410><s%> 'el unto God שִׂמְחַ֪ת <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chat my exceeding גִּ֫ילִ֥י <S%H1524><s%> gi-Li joy וְאוֹדְךָ֥ <S%H3034><s%> ve-'od-Cha will I praise בְכִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> ve-chin-Nor, yea upon the harp אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him thee O God אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai. my God

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י׀ <S%H7817><s%> tish-To-cha-Chi Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi any וּֽמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- Why תֶּהֱמִ֪י <S%H1993><s%> te-he-Mi disturbed עָ֫לָ֥י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <S%H3176><s%> ho-Chi-li within me;hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Le-lo-him in God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od shall again אוֹדֶ֑נּוּ <S%H3034><s%> o-Den-nu; for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּעֹ֥ת <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'Ot him [who is] the health פָּ֝נַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai, of my countenance וֵֽאלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> Ve-lo-Hai. and my God
